title: Promotion of trade ties with Belgium stressed
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 14 (APP):President Pakistan-Belgium-Luxembourg Business Forum Mohammad A. Rajpar called on Ambassador of Pakistan to Belgium, Luxembourg and the European Union Amna Baloch in Brussels on Thursday and discussed with her matters relating to mutual interests.
New areas of cooperation were identified in the meeting to diversify trade and investment.
They also agreed to work together to enhance trade ties between Pakistan and Belgium.
Mr. Rajpar, CE    Business Forum called on Ambassador @amnabloch4. New areas of cooperation were identified to diversify trade and agreed to  work together to enhance  in days to come.@ForeignOfficePk @PkPublicDiplo pic.twitter.com/Rq8WXIJRD2
â€” Pakistan Embassy Belgium (@EmbassyPakBel) September 14, 2023
